projectGridLines.title: Efficient Systems for Generative AI and Agentic Frameworks
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Efficient Systems for Generative AI and Agentic Frameworks


Description: Will work on the core stack and technologies that enable Adobe's various

AI-assisted-based products. The work will involve analyzing user interactions to tune

AI-Assistant's capabilities, introducing new capabilities in AI-Assistants by building

various LLM and LMM-based pipelines, work on system-level efficiency of latency

reduction and cost of deployment through various GPU and Deep Learning

optimizations and approximations. These would require a strong understanding of

deep learning stack, linear algebra and basic GPU programming.

Skill sets: Python, C, C++, CUDA, PyTorch, vLLM

Traits expectation: Strong motivation to work on hard problems, hard-working

attitude, curiosity and learning attitude, leadership skills. Requires extensive paper

reading and going deep into technology.

Expected learning: Research on enterprise Generative AI use-cases, along with

production level programming skills.

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Programming, Machine

Learning, Operating Systems
